panels.description: Data available only when config variable ANALYTICS_ENABLE_PAIRWISE_SUMMARY is true

targets.query: SELECT MEAN("response_time_s") as "Response Time" FROM "tcp_timeslice_summary_${category}" WHERE  $timeFilter and ("server_${category}" =~ /^$applications$/ ${app_filter} true) AND "response_time_s" > 0 GROUP BY time($interval),  "server_${category}" fill(none)

SELECT MEAN("response_time_s") as "Response Time" FROM "tcp_timeslice_summary_${category}" WHERE  $timeFilter and ("client_${category}" =~ /^$applications$/ ${app_filter} true) AND "response_time_s" > 0 GROUP BY time($interval),  "client_${category}" fill(none)

panels.title: ${applications}: Latency->Response Time

panels.description: Data available only when config variable ANALYTICS_ENABLE_PAIRWISE_SUMMARY is true

targets.query: SELECT MEAN("rtt_client_s") + MEAN("rtt_server_s") as "Round Trip Time" FROM "tcp_timeslice_summary_${category}" WHERE  $timeFilter and ("server_${category}" =~ /^$applications$/ ${app_filter} true) AND ("rtt_server_s" > 0 or rtt_client_s > 0) GROUP BY time($interval),  "server_${category}" fill(none)

SELECT MEAN("rtt_client_s") + MEAN("rtt_server_s") as "Round Trip Time" FROM "tcp_timeslice_summary_${category}" WHERE  $timeFilter and ("client_${category}" =~ /^$applications$/ ${app_filter} true) AND ("rtt_server_s" > 0 or rtt_client_s > 0) GROUP BY time($interval),  "client_${category}" fill(none)

panels.title: ${applications}: Latency->Round Trip Time

targets.query: SELECT ${graph_metric:raw}  FROM "flows_summary_$category" WHERE ("${category}_a" =~ /^$applications$/ ${app_filter} true) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "${category}_a" fill(none)
SELECT  ${graph_metric:raw}  FROM "flows_summary_$category" WHERE ("${category}_b" =~ /^$applications$/ ${app_filter} true) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),  "${category}_b" fill(none)

SELECT ${graph_metric:raw} FROM "tcp_timeslice_summary_${category}" WHERE  $timeFilter and ("server_${category}" =~ /^$applications$/ ${app_filter} true) GROUP BY time($interval), "server_${category}" fill(none)

SELECT ${graph_metric:raw} FROM "tcp_timeslice_summary_${category}" WHERE  $timeFilter and ("client_${category}" =~ /^$applications$/ ${app_filter} true) GROUP BY time($interval),  "client_${category}" fill(none)

SELECT ${graph_metric:raw} FROM "tcp_open_summary_${category}" WHERE  $timeFilter and ("client_${category}" =~ /^$applications$/ ${app_filter} true) GROUP BY time($interval),  "client_${category}" fill(none)

SELECT ${graph_metric:raw} FROM "tcp_open_summary_${category}" WHERE  $timeFilter and ("server_${category}" =~ /^$applications$/ ${app_filter} true) GROUP BY time($interval),  "server_${category}" fill(none)

panels.title: ${applications}: ${graph_metric}

panels.description:
Data available only when config variable ANALYTICS_ENABLE_PAIRWISE_SUMMARY is true. 
Click on the "${category:text}" column to open a dashboard with IPs in the selected ${category:text}

targets.query:
Select "server_${category}" as "tls_domain", * from
(SELECT ${tcp_ts_metric:raw} FROM "tcp_timeslice_summary_${category:raw}" WHERE  $timeFilter AND ("server_${category}" =~ /^$applications$/ ${app_filter} true) AND "${filter_tag:raw}" =~ /^(${filter_value:pipe})$/ 
 GROUP BY "server_${category}"  fill(none) )

Select "client_${category}" as "tls_domain", * from
(SELECT  ${tcp_ts_metric:raw}  FROM "tcp_timeslice_summary_${category:raw}" WHERE  $timeFilter AND ("client_${category}" =~ /^$applications$/ ${app_filter} true) AND "${filter_tag:raw}" =~ /^(${filter_value:pipe})$/ 
 GROUP BY "client_${category}"  fill(none) )

Select "server_${category}" as "tls_domain", * from
(SELECT   MEAN("rtt_client_s") + MEAN("rtt_server_s") as "Round Trip Time as Server"  FROM "tcp_timeslice_summary_${category:raw}" WHERE  $timeFilter AND ("server_${category}" =~ /^$applications$/ ${app_filter} true) AND "${filter_tag:raw}" =~ /^(${filter_value:pipe})$/ AND ("rtt_server_s" > 0 or rtt_client_s > 0) 
 GROUP BY "server_${category}"  fill(none) )

Select "client_${category}" as "tls_domain", * from
(SELECT   MEAN("rtt_client_s") + MEAN("rtt_server_s") as "Round Trip Time as Client"  FROM "tcp_timeslice_summary_${category:raw}" WHERE  $timeFilter AND ("client_${category}" =~ /^$applications$/ ${app_filter} true) AND "${filter_tag:raw}" =~ /^(${filter_value:pipe})$/ AND ("rtt_server_s" > 0 or rtt_client_s > 0) 
 GROUP BY "client_${category}"  fill(none) )

Select "server_${category}" as "tls_domain", * from
(SELECT   MEAN("response_time_s") as "Response Time as Server"  FROM "tcp_timeslice_summary_${category:raw}" WHERE  $timeFilter AND ("server_${category}" =~ /^$applications$/ ${app_filter} true) AND "${filter_tag:raw}" =~ /^(${filter_value:pipe})$/ AND ("response_time_s" > 0) 
 GROUP BY "server_${category}"  fill(none) )

Select "client_${category}" as "tls_domain", * from
(SELECT   MEAN("response_time_s") as "Response Time as Client"  FROM "tcp_timeslice_summary_${category:raw}" WHERE  $timeFilter AND ("client_${category}" =~ /^$applications$/ ${app_filter} true) AND "${filter_tag:raw}" =~ /^(${filter_value:pipe})$/ AND ("response_time_s" > 0) 
 GROUP BY "client_${category}"  fill(none) )

targets.query:
Select "server_${category}" as "tls_domain", * from
(SELECT  ${tcp_open_metric:raw}   FROM  "tcp_open_summary_${category:raw}" WHERE  $timeFilter AND ("server_${category}" =~ /^$applications$/ ${app_filter} true) AND "${filter_tag:raw}" =~ /^(${filter_value:pipe})$/ 
 GROUP BY "server_${category}" fill(none) )

Select "client_${category}" as "tls_domain", * from
(SELECT  ${tcp_open_metric:raw}  FROM  "tcp_open_summary_${category:raw}" WHERE  $timeFilter AND ("client_${category}" =~ /^$applications$/ ${app_filter} true) AND "${filter_tag:raw}" =~ /^(${filter_value:pipe})$/ 
 GROUP BY "client_${category}" fill(none) )

panels.description: Data available only when config variable ANALYTICS_ENABLE_PAIRWISE_SUMMARY is true

targets.query:
SELECT "tls_domain_a" as "tls_domain", * from
(SELECT 8*sum("bytes")/(${__to:date:seconds}-${__from:date:seconds}) as "Throughput", 8*sum("bytes_a")/(${__to:date:seconds}-${__from:date:seconds}) as "Throughput Tx",  8*sum("bytes_b")/(${__to:date:seconds}-${__from:date:seconds}) as "Throughput Rx", sum("bytes") as "Bytes", sum("packets") as "Packets",sum("bytes_b") as "Bytes Rx", sum("packets_a") AS "Packets Tx", sum("bytes_a") as "Bytes Tx", sum("packets_b") AS "Packets Rx",  sum("fragments") as "Fragments", sum("fragments_a") AS "Fragments Tx" , sum("fragments_b") AS "Fragments Rx" FROM "flows_summary_$category" 
 WHERE $timeFilter AND ("${category}_a" =~ /^$applications$/ ${app_filter} true)  AND "${filter_tag:raw}" =~ /^(${filter_value:pipe})$/ 
 GROUP BY "${category}_a" fill(none) )

SELECT "tls_domain_b" as "tls_domain", * from
(SELECT 8*sum("bytes")/(${__to:date:seconds}-${__from:date:seconds}) as "Throughput", 8*sum("bytes_a")/(${__to:date:seconds}-${__from:date:seconds}) as "Throughput Rx",  8*sum("bytes_b")/(${__to:date:seconds}-${__from:date:seconds}) as "Throughput Tx", sum("bytes") as "Bytes", sum("bytes") as "Bytes",sum("packets") as "Packets",sum("bytes_b") as "Bytes Tx", sum("packets_a") AS "Packets Rx", sum("bytes_a") as "Bytes Rx", sum("packets_b") AS "Packets Tx", sum("fragments") as "Fragments",  sum("fragments_a") AS "Fragments Rx" , sum("fragments_b") AS "Fragments Tx"  FROM "flows_summary_$category" 
 WHERE $timeFilter AND ("${category}_b" =~ /^$applications$/ ${app_filter} true)  AND "${filter_tag:raw}" =~ /^(${filter_value:pipe})$/ 
 GROUP BY "${category}_b" fill(none) )

panels.description: Data available only when config variable ANALYTICS_ENABLE_PAIRWISE_SUMMARY is true

SELECT MEAN("response_time_s") as "Response Time" FROM "tcp_timeslice_summary_${category}" WHERE  $timeFilter and ("client_${category}" =~ /^$applications$/ ${app_filter} true) AND "response_time_s" > 0 GROUP BY time($interval),  "client_${category}" fill(none)

list.label: View summary tables by
list.name: category
list.query: Hosts Group : hosts_group, tls_domain : tls_domain, SNI Name : tls_domain, Canonical Name : cname_domain

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "tcp_timeslice_summary_custom_application" WITH KEY in ("server_custom_application", "client_custom_application") where $timeFilter
list.label: tls_domains
list.name: applications
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "tcp_timeslice_summary_tls_domain" WITH KEY in ("server_tls_domain", "client_tls_domain") where $timeFilter

list.label: Graph metrics:
list.name: graph_metric

options.value: MAX("bytes_client_session_max") as "Top Client Session Bytes", Max("bytes_server_session_max") as "Top Server Session Bytes"
MAX("packets_client_session_max") as "Top Client Session Packets", MAX("packets_server_session_max") as "Top Server Session Packets"

list.query: Data->Throughput : 8000*SUM("bytes")/$__interval_ms as "Throughput", Data->Bytes : SUM("bytes") as "Bytes", Data->Packets : SUM("packets") as "Packets", Data->Session Bytes : MAX("bytes_client_session_max") as "Top Client Session Bytes"\, Max("bytes_server_session_max") as "Top Server Session Bytes",  Data->Session Packets : MAX("packets_client_session_max") as "Top Client Session Packets"\, MAX("packets_server_session_max") as "Top Server Session Packets", Fragments->Fragments : SUM("fragments") as "Fragments",Connections->Zero Byte Sessions : SUM("zero_bytes_sessions") as "Zero Byte Sessions", Connections->Completed Handshakes : Sum("connection_established") as "Completed Handshakes", Connections->Finished Sessions : Sum("finished_sessions") as "Finished Sessions", Connections->Session Duration : MAX("duration_s_max") as "Session Duration", Connections->Session Idle Time : Max("idle_s_max") as "Session Idle Time",  TCP Flags- SYNs : SUM("syns") as "SYNs", TCP Flags->SYNACKs : SUM("synacks") as "SYNACKs", TCP Flags->FINs : SUM("fins_client")+SUM("fins_server") as "FINs", TCP Flags- Resets : SUM("resets_client")+SUM("resets_server") as "Resets", TCP Flags->Client Resets : SUM("resets_client") as "Client Resets", TCP Flags->Server Resets : SUM("resets_server") as "Server Resets", Errors->Missing SYNs : SUM("missing_syns") as "Missing SYNs", Errors- SYN Failures : SUM("syn_failures") as "SYN Failures",  Errors->Retransmissions : SUM("retransmissions_client")+SUM("retransmissions_server") as "TCP Errors", Errors->Client Retransmissions : SUM("retransmissions_client") as "Client Retransmissions",  Errors->Server Retransmissions : SUM("retransmissions_server") as "Server Retransmissions", Errors->Duplicates : SUM("duplicates_client")+SUM("duplicates_server") as "Duplicates", Errors->Gaps : SUM("gaps_client")+SUM("gaps_server") as "Gaps", Errors->Sequence Errors : SUM("sequence_errors_client")+SUM("sequence_errors_server") as "Sequence Errors", Memory->Zero Windows : SUM("zwins_client")+SUM("zwins_server") as "Zero Windows"

list.label: Table metrics (timeslice):
list.name: tcp_ts_metric

options.value: Max("mtu_client") as "Client MTU", Max("mtu_server") as "Server MTU"

list.query: TCP Flags->SYNs : SUM("syns") as "SYNs", TCP Flags->SYNACKs : SUM("synacks") as "SYNACKs", TCP Flags->FINs : SUM("fins_client")+SUM("fins_server") as "FINs", TCP Flags->Resets : SUM("resets_client")+SUM("resets_server") as "Resets",Errors->Retransmissions : SUM("retransmissions_client")+SUM("retransmissions_server") as "Retransmissions", Errors->Duplicates : SUM("duplicates_client")+SUM("duplicates_server") as "Duplicates", Errors->Gaps : SUM("gaps_client")+SUM("gaps_server") as "Gaps", Errors->Sequence Errors : SUM("sequence_errors_client")+SUM("sequence_errors_server") as "Sequence Errors", Memory->Zero Windows : SUM("zwins_client")+SUM("zwins_server") as "Zero Windows", Packet Size->MTU : Max("mtu_client") as "Client MTU"\, Max("mtu_server") as "Server MTU"

value: MAX("bytes_client_session_max") as "Client Session Bytes", Max("bytes_server_session_max") as "Server Session Bytes"

list.label: Table metrics (open):
list.name: tcp_open_metric

options.value: MAX("bytes_client_session_max") as "Client Session Bytes", Max("bytes_server_session_max") as "Server Session Bytes"
MAX("packets_client_session_max") as "Client Session Packets", MAX("packets_server_session_max") as "Server Session Packets"
Max("mtu_client_session") as "Client MTU", Max("mtu_server_session") as "Server MTU"
MIN("min_win_client_session") AS "Client MinWin", MIN("min_win_server_session") as "Server MinWin"

list.query: Data - Session Bytes : MAX("bytes_client_session_max") as "Client Session Bytes"\, Max("bytes_server_session_max") as "Server Session Bytes", Data - Session Packets : MAX("packets_client_session_max") as "Client Session Packets"\, MAX("packets_server_session_max") as "Server Session Packets", Connections - Completed Handshakes : Sum("connection_established") as "Completed Handshakes", Connections - Zero Byte Sessions : SUM("zero_bytes_sessions") as "Zero Byte Sessions", Latency - Session Duration : MAX("duration_s_max") as "Session Duration", Latency - Session Idle Time : Max("idle_s_max") as "Session Idle Time", Latency - Max Response Time(open) : MAX("response_time_s_max") AS "Response Time", SYN Metrics - Missing SYNs : SUM("missing_syns") as "Missing SYNs", SYN Metrics - SYN Failures : SUM("syn_failures") as "SYN Failures", Fragments - MTU(open) : Max("mtu_client_session") as "Client MTU"\, Max("mtu_server_session") as "Server MTU", TCP Errors - Min Wins : MIN("min_win_client_session") AS "Client MinWin"\, MIN("min_win_server_session") as "Server MinWin"

list.label: With
list.name: filter_tag
list.query: cStor : cstor_name, Network Monitor : network_monitor_name, Outer VLAN : vlan_tag_outer, Inner VLAN : vlan_tag_inner

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "flows_summary_custom_application" WITH KEY = "${filter_tag}"
list.name: filter_value
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "flows_summary_tls_domain" WITH KEY = "${filter_tag}"

current.text: Show Selected tls_domains Only for Overview

list.label: Overviews:
list.name: app_filter

options.text: Show Selected tls_domains Only for Overview

list.query: Show All tls_domains for Overview : OR, Show Selected tls_domains Only for Overview : AND
